name: Autumn Memories (Nathan Wiles)
description:
There’s a lot that I wanted to do with this game that I didn’t have time for, but the gameplay is finished and you can play through to the end of this very short game! There’s no ‘win screen’, but you’ll know you’ve been successful when you raked the leaves into a pile. Enjoy and thanks for playing!

To Play:

Click on buttons to navigate around, or on elements of the scene to interact with them.
